attributes.action: protect us from the legally sanctioned terrorism assiciated with false abuse allegations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is one thing to allow people to be tied up in Court and spend tens of thousands in defence costs when there are "victims", but when the those people insist they have not been abused and are ignored, what is the point?

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/dontrewardlies/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
